TopicTitle: Deployed Science Experiment Spamming Ping AGAIN!!!!!!

Articles.Content:
There was the same issue reported by someone on Jun.

I reported the same issue for 1.7.2 stock game under this post on late June and received NO FEEDBACK.

Now the same thing happens in 1.7.3 and it's getting worse. Before the update, the spamming comes by minute and now it's by seconds, even faster than my clicking!!!! This is getting ridiculous!!!!!! The game is unplayable with this issue. I hope devs fix this fast.

Procedure to reproduce it

1. Setup science experiment on Mun. one controller, one seismic sensor, one antenna, three solar panel.

2. Drop something on Mun when the power is off to trigger seismic sensor.

 

KSP version 1.7.3.2594

Breaking Ground version 1.2.0

Log and save file: https://filehost.net/8ac1e386a9ef97ef https://filehost.net/1541ebee2729c309 https://filehost.net/6b6ece2beae7e456
I have the same problem. After a trip back from Minmus, I had to delete 400 messages. The game freezes briefly whenever you mouse over the message inbox.

I'm having the same exact problem - put down a deployed science setup on Mun near one of the poles, which quickly ended up in the dark.  Had an ship, erm, have a rapid unplanned deceleration at Mun's surface, and ever since I've been getting a tremendous number of messages (which show their text on screen).  I think they may also be contributing to lag in the game.

Here is a workaround for the problem: https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/23172#note-19

Edit both your persistent.sfs and GameData\SquadExpansion\Serenity\Resources\DeployedScience.cfg and increase the value ScienceTimeDelay from 60 (one Message every Minute) e.g. to 21600 (one Message every Kerbin day).
